KnownHost, LLC is a privately held firm that has been providing premium managed services since 2006.

Don’t you hate it when you sign up for a hosting plan with special features or pricing only to find out a few months later you must pay extra? Like what, you are not valuable anymore because you are a customer? Let KnownHost® show you how you should be treated.

For a limited time signup today and get 30% off for life. To take advantage of our LIFETIME discount! Use coupon code KH30DEAL!

To KNOWNHOST, you are always valuable! Here is how we prove it to you every day:

  • 100% SSD BACKED. All cloud servers are backed by our Enterprise grade SSD Storage Clusters!
  • PROVEN UPTIME. 99.996% uptime record that is top of the industry! Why? Because you want hosting, not excuses.
  • ALWAYS ONLINE SUPPORT. 24/7/365 customer support. You contact us. We answer. Simple, right? We've got you covered from initial setup to support 24 hours a day
  • 30 DAYS MONEY BACK. Anyone can behave for a few days. Once the NEW customer label clicks off your account, most hosting companies struggle to remember your account number. Try us out for 30 days, poke into all the features, and test our customer service. You don’t love KNOWNHOST -> you get your money back.
